item.description:
The Boston Beanstalks Annual Weekend takes place in Portland, Maine this year, from Friday Oct. 12th thru Sunday Oct. 14th, 2007.

Full members of BBTC (who have paid their $45 in annual dues & have had their height verified by a Board member), or other TCI Clubs, are eligible to attend the full weekend. [Incentive for prospective members / fence-sitters to sign up?!].

If you are not yet a fully paid-up member of BBTC or another TCI Club, you are eligible to attend the public event portion of the Weekend, which is the Dance on Saturday night.

For full details on the Weekend, please go to
BBTC Yankee Clipper Weekend

NOTE: If you want to stay overnight in Portland at our hotel, we do have a Group rate - but you MUST book before September 19, 2007 to get the Group rate (subject to availability). See the Weekend flier for prices and contact info. Weekend Flier
item.name: Saturday Night Dance - Yankee Clipper Weekend
